page.title: 07 LIFE IN 1935.
page.content: We interviewed Mr.Darch,our school caretaker,to compare life in Combe Martin 50 years ago. In 1935 most of the houses were the same size. But the houses that were been built at that time were much larger. The school in 1935 was the same except for equipment,size and space.The games they played werenormal like Football marbles, conkers, and skipping etc. On special occasions they went down the bowling green and learned to swim in the sea. There were many more shops in Combe Martin 50 years ago because there are more cash and carrys in the towns now. Life was similar in those days except for TVs fridges computers, etc.Most people have a car now days.Everybody today is better off than in those days. The village has changed a little, its got a little larger and there are more .
